dmca.title: [EV1-C1553529K] urgent copyright and trade mark infringement
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.ev1servers.net/About/dmca.aspx Legal Response Team -----Original Message----- From: abuse@ev1.net [mailto:abuse@ev1.net] Posted At: Friday, October 27, 2006 6:45 AM Posted To: DMCA Houston Conversation: [EV1-C1553529K] urgent copyright and trade mark infringement Subject: [EV1-C1553529K] urgent copyright and trade mark infringement ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. urgent copyright and trade mark infringement Added by system at Friday, Oct 27 2006 10:38 am X-MailFrom: jonathan@x-rm.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [172.16.220.212] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Fri Oct 27 08:41:13 2006 Received: from Exchanger.ev1servers.net ([207.218.222.101]) by MAILCORE.THEPLANET.COM with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Fri, 27 Oct 2006 08:37:45 -0500 Received: from mailin.ev1servers.net ([207.218.222.124]) by Exchanger.ev1servers.net with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Fri, 27 Oct 2006 08:37:38 -0500 X-ASG-Debug-ID: 1161956251-19303-392-0 X-Barracuda-URL: http://207.218.222.124:8000/cgi-bin/mark.cgi X-ASG-Recipient-Whitelist: abuse@ev1servers.net Received: from mail.x-rm.com (neon.staging.x-rm.com [195.166.37.20]) by mailin.ev1servers.net (Spam Firewall) with ESMTP id 4D0A862F1 for ; Fri, 27 Oct 2006 08:37:37 -0500 (CDT) Received: from jonathan by x-rm.com (MDaemon.PRO.v8.1.4.R) with ESMTP id md50000464778.msg for ; Fri, 27 Oct 2006 14:37:18 +0100 From: "Jonathan Block" To: Cc: "Jonathan Brown" X-ASG-Orig-Subj: urgent copyright and trade mark infringement Subject: urgent copyright and trade mark infringement Date: Fri, 27 Oct 2006 14:36:54 +0100 Message-ID: <001801c6f9cc$f74c3890$5300a8c0@winchester.local> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_NextPart_000_0019_01C6F9D5.5910A090" X-Mailer: Microsoft Office Outlook 11 Thread-Index: Acb5zPb/ewcMYp12So6Au/JMvU8Qeg== X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.2962 X-Return-Path: jonathan@x-rm.com X-MDaemon-Deliver-To: abuse@ev1servers.net X-Spam-Checker-Version: SpamAssassin 3.0.4 (2005-06-05) X-Spam-Report: * 0.0 HTML_MESSAGE BODY: HTML included in message * -4.7 BAYES_00 BODY: Bayesian spam probability is 0 to 1% * [score: 0.0000] X-Spam-Status: No, score=-4.7 required=5.1 tests=BAYES_00,HTML_MESSAGE autolearn=ham version=3.0.4 X-Spam-Level: X-Spam-Processed: mail.x-rm.com, Fri, 27 Oct 2006 14:37:19 +0100 X-Virus-Scanned: by Barracuda Spam Firewall at ev1servers.net X-Barracuda-Spam-Score: 0.00 X-Barracuda-Spam-Status: No, SCORE=0.00 using global scores of TAG_LEVEL=4.0 QUARANTINE_LEVEL=1000.0 KILL_LEVEL=8.0 WHITELISTED Return-Path: jonathan@x-rm.com X-OriginalArrivalTime: 27 Oct 2006 13:37:38.0645 (UTC) FILETIME=[11A7A850:01C6F9CD] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) Sirs We would be very grateful if you would immediately cease hosting www.jeytech.com. This entity have cloned almost the whole of our website. They are infringing on our design copyright as well as our registered trade mark. You can verify that they have done this by the following: 1. A comparision of the design elements of www.jeytech.com and our site www.x-rm.com will immediately indicate the infringement of our design copyright. 2. We have a registered US trademark for SetsecureT which they are infringing. 3. They have even ommitted to remove the name X-RM from one section of their site http://www.jeytech.com/FacilitiesManagement.htm Please reply immediately and inform us of your intended actions as your company is causing serious damage to our business by hosting this site. Please note that Turkish Cyprus is known to be outside the reach of normal international legal restrictions. EV1 should have exercised extreme caution and conducted prudent due diligence before hosting a site for an entity based in this jurisdiction. Sincerely J D Block Managing Director 6 St Peter St. Winchester Hants SO238BN 01962 877237 www.x-rm.com cc: J Brown Attorney at Law MIME element (text/html)
Sirs
 
We would be very grateful if you would immediately cease hosting www.jeytech.com. This entity have cloned almost the whole of our website. They are infringing on our design copyright as well as our registered trade mark. 
 
You can verify that they have done this by the following:
 
1. A comparision of the design elements of www.jeytech.com and our site www.x-rm.com will immediately indicate the infringement of our design copyright.
2. We have a registered US trademark for Setsecure™ which they are infringing.
3. They have even ommitted to remove the name X-RM from one section of their site http://www.jeytec h.com/FacilitiesManagement.htm
 
Please reply immediately and inform us of your intended actions as your company is causing serious damage to our business by hosting this site.
 
Please note that Turkish Cyprus is known to be outside the reach of normal international legal restrictions.  EV1 should have exercised extreme caution and conducted prudent due diligence before hosting a site for an entity based in this jurisdiction. 
 
Sincerely
 
J D Block 
 
Managing Director
 
6 St Peter St.
Winchester
Hants
SO238BN
01962 877237
www.x-rm.com
 
cc: J Brown Attorney at Law
MIME element (text/plain)
